name: Christopher Villaran
description: Frontend Web Developer with more than 5 years of experience in developing user interfaces, maintaining legacy codebase, debugging user reported issues and testing code changes for 5 Chrome Extensions that provided CRM integrations in Gmail. With these amount of experiences, I believe that there are still a lot of room for me to grow in my career as a Web Developer. And joining your team will help me further develop my skills and thrive in my field of expertise.

experience.title: Fullstack Web Developer
points: Created custom policies in Azure AD B2C (Identity Framework) for implementing SSO to be used by our users
Implemented usage of Storybook for UI/UX documentation
Refactored Frontend codebase to follow Atomic Design which is highly recommended when using Storybook
Occasionally presented our team's accomplishments in sprint reviews
Lead the training for our team's Fullstack Web Developer interns on the Frontend side

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
points: Contributed to the development of Sugar Connect (version 2 of Collabspot Classic)
Maintained 4 versions of Collabspot Classic (Collabspot for Sugar 7+, Collabspot for Sugar 6, Collabspot for Salesforce, Collabspot for Highrise)
Implemented feature requests from several users both regular and VIP (Gordon Foods, Epidemic Sound, Sanmina, etc.)
Created an end-to-end test automation as a proof of concept using Protractor
